title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, black and purple applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist (chintz).
description: Small fragment showing part of a cornucopia-like shape and floral vines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, black and purple applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-52.
